#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(){
int t,n,k,p,a[1001];
cin>>t;
while(t--){
cin>>n>>k;
memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
a[0]=1;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
cin>>p;
for(int j=k-p;j>=0 && a[k]==0;j--)
{if(a[j]==1)
a[j+p]=1;
//cout<<"a["<<j<<"] "<<a[j]<<endl;
//cout<<"a["<<j+p<<"] "<<a[j+p]<<endl;

}
}
cout<<a[k]<<endl;}
return 0;
}
